title: POI S3E17 / [root path], p8 [Root]
author: Root & Shaw
comment: He really is the best damn otolaryngologist in town. By the camera timestamps, he only took 9 minutes!

I love how this guy comes out and there's a pretty, white, well dressed young woman just chilling and greets him with a smile.
Now I'm prerty sure most people who are met with this wouldn't have any real worries but this dude comes out and I swear just the overall vibe Root has, has him immediately trying to hit up the cops 😂😂😂
When they fire the guns the slide doesn't slide back. It takes away the realism of shooting a gun.
description:
Root gets her cochlear implant.
Then she shows up guns blazing to save the janitor.

Episode summary:
The Machine orders Root on several tasks such as helping a convict escape and using him to impersonate a Department of Defense employee in order to obtain a secret note. Afterward, she and Harold's team coincidentally reach the same person, a janitor. It later turns out that NSA has been testing an advanced supercomputing chip and the janitor was one of the 15 people who had access to the development lab. This makes both Decima and Vigilance come after him. Whilst Harold and his team's assignment was to protect the janitor, Root had to stop the chip from falling into Decima's hands. They are able to save the janitor, but Decima gets the chip.

March 18, 2014
